item.title: Tor and HTTPS
item.description: https://www.eff.org/pages/tor-and-https Have installed EFF’s HTTPS Everywhere extension already, now need to figure out Tor as well. Note: This is an archived post from my unmaintained Tumblr blog https://k4rtik.tumblr.com
